column1: In this course, we will analyze ways in which artists combine visual imagery with music as with MTV-style music videos.  The music business and how it relates/effects music videos.  Each student will develop his or hew own music video project from script to final edit with a local band of their choice, through their own scheduling process.  PREREQUISITE(S): (DC 210 and DC 220) or DC 460 or DC 409
